bioghist.p: John Lucas & Co. were manufacturers of paint and varnishes located in Gibbsboro, New Jersey, and Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two folders of correspondence, reports, and printed material. Much of the correspondence relates to company policies, formulations of paints and varnishes, and customer responses to various products. A good deal of the correspondence is not original, but transcribed copies grouped by subject matter. The printed items include a small number of advertisements and product brochures. The pages appear to have been removed from a letterbook and are sequentially numbered, but many pages are missing.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
